name: Shakir
text: Ta Sin Mim.

name: Shakir
text: These are the verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.

name: Shakir
text: Perhaps you will kill yourself with grief because they do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: If We please, We should send down upon them a sign from the heaven so that their necks should stoop to it.

name: Shakir
text: And there does not come to them a new reminder from the Beneficent Allah but they turn aside from it.

name: Shakir
text: So they have indeed rejected (the truth), therefore the news of that which they mock shall soon come to them.

name: Shakir
text: Do they not see the earth, how many of every noble kind We have caused to grow in it?

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in that, but most of them will not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: And when your Lord called out to Musa, saying: Go to the unjust people,

name: Shakir
text: The people of Firon: Will they not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: He said: O my Lord! surely I fear that they will reject me;

name: Shakir
text: And by breast straitens, and my tongue is not eloquent, therefore send Thou to Haroun (to help me);

name: Shakir
text: And they have a crime against me, therefore I fear that they may slay me.

name: Shakir
text: He said: By no means, so go you both with Our signs; surely We are with you, hearing;

name: Shakir
text: Then come to Firon and say: Surely we are the apostles of the Lord of the worlds:

name: Shakir
text: Then send with us the children of Israel.

name: Shakir
text: (Firon) said: Did we not bring you up as a child among us, and you tarried among us for (many) years of your life?

name: Shakir
text: And you did (that) deed of yours which you did, and you are one of the ungrateful.

name: Shakir
text: He said: I did it then while I was of those unable to see the right course;

name: Shakir
text: So I fled from you when I feared you, then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me of the apostles;

name: Shakir
text: And is it a favor of which you remind me that you have enslaved the children of Israel?

name: Shakir
text: Firon said: And what is the Lord of the worlds?

name: Shakir
text: He said: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, if you would be sure.

name: Shakir
text: (Firon) said to those around him: Do you not hear?

name: Shakir
text: He said: Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of old.

name: Shakir
text: Said he: Most surely your Apostle who is sent to you is mad.

name: Shakir
text: He said: The Lord of the east and the west and what is between them, if you understand.

name: Shakir
text: Said he: If you will take a god besides me, I will most certainly make you one of the imprisoned.

name: Shakir
text: He said: What! even if I bring to you something manifest?

name: Shakir
text: Said he: Bring it then, if you are of the truthful ones.

name: Shakir
text: So he cast down his rod, and lo! it was an obvious serpent,

name: Shakir
text: And he drew forth his hand, and lo! it appeared white to the onlookers.

name: Shakir
text: (Firon) said to the chiefs around him: Most surely this is a skillful magician,

name: Shakir
text: Who desires to turn you out of your land with his magic; what is it then that you advise?

name: Shakir
text: They said: Give him and his brother respite and send heralds into the cities

name: Shakir
text: That they should bring to you every skillful magician.

name: Shakir
text: So the magicians were gathered together at the appointed time on the fixed day,

name: Shakir
text: And it was said to the people: Will you gather together?

name: Shakir
text: Haply we may follow the magicians, if they are the vanquishers.

name: Shakir
text: And when the magicians came, they said to Firon: Shall we get a reward if we are the vanquishers?

name: Shakir
text: He said: Yes, and surely you will then be of those who are made near.

name: Shakir
text: Musa said to them: Cast what you are going to cast.

name: Shakir
text: So they cast down their cords and their rods and said: By Firon's power, we shall most surely be victorious.

name: Shakir
text: Then Musa cast down his staff and lo! it swallowed up the lies they told.

name: Shakir
text: And the magicians were thrown down prostrate;

name: Shakir
text: They said: We believe in the Lord of the worlds:

name: Shakir
text: The Lord of Musa and Haroun.

name: Shakir
text: Said he: You believe in him before I give you permission; most surely he is the chief of you who taught you the magic, so you shall know: certainly I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and certainly I will crucify you all.

name: Shakir
text: They said: No harm; surely to our Lord we go back;

name: Shakir
text: Surely we hope that our Lord will forgive us our wrongs because we are the first of the believers.

name: Shakir
text: And We revealed to Musa, saying: Go away with My servants travelling by night, surely you will be pursued.

name: Shakir
text: So Firon sent heralds into the cities;

name: Shakir
text: Most surely these are a small company;

name: Shakir
text: And most surely they have enraged us;

name: Shakir
text: And most surely we are a vigilant multitude.

name: Shakir
text: So We turned them out of gardens and springs,

name: Shakir
text: And treasures and goodly dwellings,

name: Shakir
text: Even so. And We gave them as a heritage to the children of Israel.

name: Shakir
text: Then they pursued them at sunrise.

name: Shakir
text: So when the two hosts saw each other, the companions of Musa cried out: Most surely we are being overtaken.

name: Shakir
text: He said: By no means; surely my Lord is with me: He will show me a way out.

name: Shakir
text: Then We revealed to Musa: Strike the sea with your staff. So it had cloven asunder, and each part was like a huge mound.

name: Shakir
text: And We brought near, there, the others.

name: Shakir
text: And We saved Musa and those with him, all of them.

name: Shakir
text: Then We drowned the others.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: And recite to them the story of Ibrahim.

name: Shakir
text: When he said to his father and his people: What do you worship?

name: Shakir
text: They said: We worship idols, so we shall be their votaries.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Do they hear you when you call?

name: Shakir
text: Or do they profit you or cause you harm?

name: Shakir
text: They said: Nay, we found our fathers doing so.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Have you then considered what you have been worshipping:

name: Shakir
text: You and your ancient sires.

name: Shakir
text: Surely they are enemies to me, but not (so) the Lord of the worlds;

name: Shakir
text: Who created me, then He has shown me the way:

name: Shakir
text: And He Who gives me to eat and gives me to drink:

name: Shakir
text: And when I am sick, then He restores me to health

name: Shakir
text: And He Who will cause me to die, then give me life;

name: Shakir
text: And Who, I hope, will forgive me my mistakes on the day of judgment.

name: Shakir
text: My Lord: Grant me wisdom, and join me with the good

name: Shakir
text: And ordain for me a goodly mention among posterity

name: Shakir
text: And make me of the heirs of the garden of bliss

name: Shakir
text: And forgive my father, for surely he is of those who have gone astray;

name: Shakir
text: And disgrace me not on the day when they are raised

name: Shakir
text: The day on which property will not avail, nor sons

name: Shakir
text: Except him who comes to Allah with a heart free (from evil).

name: Shakir
text: And the garden shall be brought near for those who guard (against evil),

name: Shakir
text: And the hell shall be made manifest to the erring ones,

name: Shakir
text: And it shall be said to them: Where are those that you used to worship;

name: Shakir
text: Besides Allah? Can they help you or yet help themselves?

name: Shakir
text: So they shall be thrown down into it, they and the erring ones,

name: Shakir
text: And the hosts of the Shaitan, all.

name: Shakir
text: They shall say while they contend therein:

name: Shakir
text: By Allah! we were certainly in manifest error,

name: Shakir
text: When we made you equal to the Lord of the worlds;

name: Shakir
text: And none but the guilty led us astray;

name: Shakir
text: So we have no intercessors,

name: Shakir
text: Nor a true friend;

name: Shakir
text: But if we could but once return, we would be of the believers.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: The people of Nuh rejected the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When their brother Nuh said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: Surely I am a faithful apostle to you;

name: Shakir
text: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me

name: Shakir
text: And I do not ask you any reward for it; my reward is only with the Lord of the worlds:

name: Shakir
text: So guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me.

name: Shakir
text: They said: Shall we believe in you while the meanest follow you?

name: Shakir
text: He said: And what knowledge have I of what they do?

name: Shakir
text: Their account is only with my Lord, if you could perceive

name: Shakir
text: And I am not going to drive away the believers;

name: Shakir
text: I am naught but a plain warner.

name: Shakir
text: They said: If you desist not, O Nuh, you shall most certainly be of those stoned to death.

name: Shakir
text: He said: My Lord! Surely my people give me the lie!

name: Shakir
text: Therefore judge Thou between me and them with a (just) judgment, and deliver me and those who are with me of the believers.

name: Shakir
text: So We delivered him and those with him in the laden ark.

name: Shakir
text: Then We drowned the rest afterwards

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: Ad gave the lie to the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When their brother Hud said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: Surely I am a faithful apostle to you;

name: Shakir
text: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me:

name: Shakir
text: And I do not ask you any reward for it; surely my reward is only with the Lord of the worlds

name: Shakir
text: Do you build on every height a monument? Vain is it that you do:

name: Shakir
text: And you make strong fortresses that perhaps you may

name: Shakir
text: And when you lay hands (on men) you lay hands (like) tyrants;

name: Shakir
text: So guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me

name: Shakir
text: And be careful of (your duty to) Him Who has given you abundance of what you know.

name: Shakir
text: He has given you abundance of cattle and children

name: Shakir
text: And gardens and fountains;

name: Shakir
text: Surely I fear for you the chastisement of a grievous day

name: Shakir
text: They said: It is the same to us whether you admonish or are not one of the admonishers

name: Shakir
text: This is naught but a custom of the ancients;

name: Shakir
text: And we are not going to be punished.

name: Shakir
text: So they gave him the lie, then We destroyed them. Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: Samood gave the lie to the apostles

name: Shakir
text: When their brother Salih said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: Surely I am a faithful apostle to you

name: Shakir
text: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me:

name: Shakir
text: And I do not ask you any reward for it; my reward is only with the Lord of the worlds:

name: Shakir
text: Will you be left secure in what is here;

name: Shakir
text: In gardens and fountains,

name: Shakir
text: And cornfields and palm-trees having fine spadices?

name: Shakir
text: And you hew houses out of the mountains exultingly;

name: Shakir
text: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me;

name: Shakir
text: And do not obey the bidding of the extravagant,

name: Shakir
text: Who make mischief in the land and do not act aright.

name: Shakir
text: They said: You are only of the deluded ones;

name: Shakir
text: You are naught but a mortal like ourselves; so bring a sign if you are one of the truthful.

name: Shakir
text: He said: This is a she-camel; she shall have her portion of water, and you have your portion of water on an appointed time;

name: Shakir
text: And do not touch her with evil, lest the punishment of a grievous day should overtake you.

name: Shakir
text: But they hamstrung her, then regretted;

name: Shakir
text: So the punishment overtook them. Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: The people of Lut gave the lie to the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When their brother Lut said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: Surely I am a faithful apostle to you;

name: Shakir
text: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me:

name: Shakir
text: And I do not ask you any reward for it; my reward is only with the Lord of the worlds;

name: Shakir
text: What! do you come to the males from among the creatures

name: Shakir
text: And leave what your Lord has created for you of your wives? Nay, you are a people exceeding limits.

name: Shakir
text: They said: If you desist not, O Lut! you shall surely be of those who are expelled.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Surely I am of those who utterly abhor your doing;

name: Shakir
text: My Lord! deliver me and my followers from what they do.

name: Shakir
text: So We delivered him and his followers all,

name: Shakir
text: Except an old woman, among those who remained behind.

name: Shakir
text: Then We utterly destroyed the others.

name: Shakir
text: And We rained down upon them a rain, and evil was the rain on those warned.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: The dwellers of the thicket gave the lie to the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When Shu'aib said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: Surely I am a faithful apostle to you;

name: Shakir
text: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me:

name: Shakir
text: And I do not ask you any reward for it, my reward is only with the Lord of the worlds;

name: Shakir
text: Give a full measure and be not of those who diminish;

name: Shakir
text: And weigh (things) with a right balance,

name: Shakir
text: And do not wrong men of their things, and do not act corruptly in the earth, making mischief.

name: Shakir
text: And guard against (the punishment of) Him who created you and the former nations.

name: Shakir
text: They said: You are only of those deluded;

name: Shakir
text: And you are naught but a mortal like ourselves, and we know you to be certainly of the liars.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore cause a portion of the heaven to come down upon us, if you are one of the truthful.

name: Shakir
text: He said: My Lord knows best what you do.

name: Shakir
text: But they called him a liar, so the punishment of the day of covering overtook them; surely it was the punishment of a grievous day.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely your Lord is Mighty, the Merciful.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely this is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

name: Shakir
text: The Faithful Spirit has descended with it,

name: Shakir
text: Upon your heart that you may be of the warners

name: Shakir
text: In plain Arabic language.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely the same is in the scriptures of the ancients.

name: Shakir
text: Is it not a sign to them that the learned men of the Israelites know it?

name: Shakir
text: And if we had revealed it to any of the foreigners

name: Shakir
text: So that he should have recited it to them, they would not have believed therein.

name: Shakir
text: Thus have We caused it to enter into the hearts of the guilty.

name: Shakir
text: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.

name: Shakir
text: And it shall come to them all of a sudden, while they shall not perceive;

name: Shakir
text: Then they will say: Shall we be respited?

name: Shakir
text: What! do they still seek to hasten on Our punishment?

name: Shakir
text: Have you then considered if We let them enjoy themselves for years,

name: Shakir
text: Then there comes to them that with which they are threatened,

name: Shakir
text: That which they were made to enjoy shall not avail them?

name: Shakir
text: And We did not destroy any town but it had (its) warners,

name: Shakir
text: To remind, and We are never unjust.

name: Shakir
text: And the Shaitans have not come down with it.

name: Shakir
text: And it behoves them not, and they have not the power to do (it).

name: Shakir
text: Most surely they are far removed from the hearing of it.

name: Shakir
text: So call not upon another god with Allah, lest you be of those who are punished.

name: Shakir
text: And warn your nearest relations,

name: Shakir
text: And be kind to him who follows you of the believers.

name: Shakir
text: But if they disobey you, then say: Surely I am clear of what you do.

name: Shakir
text: And rely on the Mighty, the Merciful,

name: Shakir
text: Who sees you when you stand up.

name: Shakir
text: And your turning over and over among those who prostrate themselves before Allah.

name: Shakir
text: Surely He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

name: Shakir
text: Shall I inform you (of him) upon whom the Shaitans descend?

name: Shakir
text: They descend upon every lying, sinful one,

name: Shakir
text: They incline their ears, and most of them are liars.

name: Shakir
text: And as to the poets, those who go astray follow them.

name: Shakir
text: Do you not see that they wander about bewildered in every valley?

name: Shakir
text: And that they say that which they do not do,

name: Shakir
text: Except those who believe and do good and remember Allah much, and defend themselves after they are oppressed; and they who act unjustly shall know to what final place of turning they shall turn back.
